@dev Basic version of StandardToken, with no allowances.

transfer
balanceOf
StandardToken

approve
allowance

attributes.documentation:
approve should be called when allowed[_spender] == 0. To increment
allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until
the first transaction is mined)
attributes.name: increaseApproval
Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
attributes.name: Pausable

attributes.documentation: Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
attributes.name: pause

attributes.documentation: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
attributes.name: unpause

attributes.documentation: check if given address is frozen.
attributes.name: isFrozen

attributes.documentation: Freezes address (no transfer can be made from or to this address).
attributes.name: freeze

attributes.documentation: Unfreezes frozen address.
attributes.name: unfreeze
